metaTitle: Villa Lotus Jávea - €1.55M Zeezicht Villa | Cap Martí
metaDescription: Luxury 3-bedroom Villa Lotus in Cap Martí, Jávea. €1,550,000. Panoramic sea views, 1000m² plot, pool. Premium Costa Blanca location near golf course.
